nodes.text: Piar Nagelsa was an officer in the Kerkoidian Defense Force of the planet Kerkoidia. During the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems, Nagelsa joined the Confederacy alongside the Kerkoidian Defense Force, in which the officer led Separatist forces.

Piar Nagelsa was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars roleplaying products. The character originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where Nagelsa was mentioned in the 2012 reference book The Essential Guide to Warfare, which was written by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart.
